revisions.rev:
{{Infobox_Company | company_name = Verizon North LLC| company_logo = <!-- Do NOT place non-free media here without complying with WP:NFCC 10c -->| company_type = [[Private company|Private]] (Subsidiary of [[Verizon]])| company_slogan = | foundation = [[2010]]| location = | key_people = | industry = [[Telecommunications]]| num_employees = | products = [[Telephone|Local Telephone Service]]| revenue = | parent = [[Verizon Communications|Verizon]] (2010-present)| homepage = [http://www.verizon.com verizon.com]| }} '''Verizon North LLC''' is a [[Verizon]] operating company providing local telephone service to former [[GTE]] customers in [[Pennsylvania]].
==History== In [[2010]], when the original [[Frontier North|Verizon North]] was sold to [[Frontier Communications]], whose service region included Pennsylvania<ref>[http://www.pabulletin.com/secure/data/vol39/39-49/2258.html PA Bulletin, Doc. No. 09-2258<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>. The original Verizon North became [[Frontier North]], Pennsylvania operations were split into a new company, '''Verizon North Retain Company'''<ref>http://wutc.wa.gov/rms2.nsf/177d98baa5918c7388256a550064a61e/5f6cff42529e2356882575c8007b94e5!OpenDocument</ref>.
The current company, '''Verizon North LLC''', was created in [[December]] [[2010]] and absorbed the operations of Verizon North Retain Co.<ref>[http://www.pabulletin.com/secure/data/vol40/40-40/1912.html Pennsylvania Public Service Bulletin]</ref>
It is separate from [[Bell of Pennsylvania|Verizon Pennsylvania]] which provides telephone service to former [[Bell System]] lines.
